title: After the glaciers
brief_description: Shows how much of the northern hemisphere surged back to abundant life during the periods of ice age retreat. Follows the pattern of plant succession, from lichens to mosses, to a forest.
description: Shows how much of the northern hemisphere surged back to abundant life during the periods of ice age retreat. Follows the pattern of plant succession, from lichens to mosses, to a forest.
